title: Simple
content: Tide strips away all extraneous details and tasks, allowing you to focus on the essentials. Our streamlined onboarding process is designed to be as easy as possible.

title: Only What's Necessary (OWN)
content: Everybody's web3 journey is different. Your onboarding experience will be tailored to your specific endeavors, only including technologies relevant to your goals.
